title: Wine and Cheetos
description: This week we dig into chef Marcus Samuelsson’s ethnic pantry. His latest book is Marcus Off Duty: The Recipes I Cook at Home.  We look at the decline of traditional French cheese in France, we match junk food with wine for a lesson in wine pairing with Anthony Giglio and we talk to the duo who documented Cuban home cooking in their new book, The Cuban Table.

byline: David Leite, Marcus Samuelsson, Rebecca Sheir and Lynne Rossetto Kasper
